data.text:
Athletics

2024-2025 Sport Schedules - Fall

Stockdale ISD Athletics is an extracurricular option for students entering 7th grade through 12th grade. We strive for excellence and hold our athletes to the highest standards of our2023-2024 Athletic Handbook. Our purpose is to:

encourage participation in all sports.

stress the high ideals of sportsmanship.

strive for excellence

administer the programs so that there will be a minimum loss of school time for participants and coaches.

foster proper respect for authority

compete within the spirit of the rules be gracious in victory or loss

teach good work habits to participate

***All boys in athletics from 6th grade pre athletics thru High school athletics need to have a shirt and a pair of shorts for the athletic periods.***

>>> Click here to view PDF version <<<

CLICK HERE TO PURCHASE TICKETS/SEASON PASSES FOR GAMES

**You can also purchase season passes in person at the Stockdale Administration office.**
